title: Salesforce CEO confirms 4,000 layoffs ‘because I need less heads’ with AI
description: Salesforce has cut 4,000 of its customer support roles, CEO Marc Benioff recently said while discussing how artificial intelligence has helped reduce the company headcount
content:
Salesforce has cut 4,000 of its customer support roles, CEO Marc Benioff recently said while discussing how artificial intelligence has helped reduce the company headcount.

title: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff says tech giant cut 4,000 support roles because of AI
description: Artificial intelligence already is replacing certain jobs at technology companies.
content:
Artificial intelligence already is replacing certain jobs at technology companies.

title: Trump says White House window video is AI. His team indicated it's real
description: President Donald Trump said a video circulating online that showed items being tossed out of an upstairs window of the White House was created with artificial intelligence, despite his press team seeming to confirm the veracity of it hours earlier.
content:
By MICHELLE L. PRICE, Associated Press

title: ChatGPT to get parental controls after teen's death

content:
Paris, France—American artificial intelligence firm OpenAI said Tuesday it would add parental controls to its chatbot ChatGPT, a week after an American couple said the system encouraged their teenaged son to kill himself.

title: Apple’s lead AI researcher for robotics heads to Meta as part of latest exits
description: Apple Inc.'s lead artificial intelligence researcher for robotics has departed the company to join Meta Platforms Inc.'s competing effort, part of an exodus of AI talent from the iPhone maker.
content:

title: Nvidia’s $286 billion rout takes stock below key level
description: Nvidia Corp. closed below a key technical level for the first time since May as investors continue to rotate out of the leading maker of artificial intelligence chips.
content:
